root.name: Zork Classics: Interactive Fiction
root.description: GamesIncluded in the compilation are:Zork I: The Great Underground EmpireZork II: The Wizard of FrobozzZork III: The Dungeon MasterBeyond Zork: The Coconut of QuendorZork Zero: The Revenge of MegabozEnchanterSorcererSpellbreakerWishbringerThis list represents the entirety of the Zork Trilogy and Enchanter Trilogy, along with a few other miscellaneous Zork games.
